Class MediaPlayerManager

fr.uge.susfighter.mvc.MediaPlayerManager
public class MediaPlayerManager extends Object
This class manage the sound of the game (music)

  • Method Details

    • setSound

      public static void setSound(javafx.scene.media.Media media)
      This method dispose of old sound if there is one and create a new media player with the new song and play it. It also make it repeat itself
      Parameters:
      media - sound

    • setSound

      public static void setSound(javafx.scene.media.Media media, boolean bool)
      This method dispose of old sound if there is one and create a new media player with the new song and play it. It also make it repeat itself if bool. Volume is set to 0 if media is muted
      Parameters:
      media - sound
      bool - true to repeat song indefinitely

    • setRepeat

      public static void setRepeat(boolean b)
      Make sound repeat itself at the end of the music if b
      Parameters:
      b - true if need to repeat

    • swapVolume

      public static void swapVolume()
      swap the volume of music to 1 or 0 and swap isMuted too

    • isMuted

      public static boolean isMuted()
      This method return true if sound is muted
      Returns:
      true if sound is muted
